cause.description:
We have to start in a one point so please help us with our mission for example (below the povert line in Syria is more than 50%) The journey of the thousand miles starts with one step and this step will start in Damascus Syria so please help us to make this world a better place because I belive that each one of us have a mission in this world.
1. Children right to live a good life
2. Children right to get education
3. Peoples right to live there lives
cause.name: Stop poverty
